main_mesh.description: The main mesh for the problem

ser_ref_levels.description: Number of times to refine the mesh uniformly in serial.

par_ref_levels.description: Number of times to refine the mesh uniformly in parallel.

approx_elements.description: Approximate number of elements in an n-ball mesh

order.description: Order degree of the finite elements.

mu.description: Shear modulus in the Neo-Hookean hyperelastic model.

K.description: Bulk modulus in the Neo-Hookean hyperelastic model.

geometric_nonlin.description: Flag to include geometric nonlinearities in the residual calculation.

material_nonlin.description: Flag to include material nonlinearities (linear elastic vs. neo-Hookean material model).

equation_solver.description: Linear and Nonlinear stiffness Solver Parameters.

type.description: The type of solver parameters to use (iterative|direct)

rel_tol.description: Relative tolerance for the linear solve.

abs_tol.description: Absolute tolerance for the linear solve.

max_iter.description: Maximum iterations for the linear solve.

rel_tol.description: Relative tolerance for the Newton solve.

abs_tol.description: Absolute tolerance for the Newton solve.

max_iter.description: Maximum iterations for the Newton solve.

enforcement_method.description: Time-varying constraint enforcement method to use

vector_constant.description: The constant vector to use as the coefficient

vector_function.description: The function to use for an mfem::VectorFunctionCoefficient

scalar_function.description: The function to use for an mfem::FunctionCoefficient

component.description: The vector component to which the scalar coefficient should be applied

constant.description: The constant scalar value to use as the coefficient

vector_constant.description: The constant vector to use as the coefficient
